text: Open hard on the passenger seat of a speeding minivan, wh a MALE TEENAGER is slumped against his blood-stained wind He’s dead, and a distinctly female voice is screaming in recognition of this horror. Pull out to reveal that this voice belongs to the minivan driver, the late teen’s MOTHER, who’s presumably racing t hospital.
Why? Why is this happening?! Pull out even more to reveal two more DEAD BOYS in the ba seats of the vehicle. More subtle this time. They’re slumped over their PSPs. We can’t see their faces.
Just hold on! I’m going to get you help! I’m-- The mother is cut off mid-sentence by EXPLODING GLASS, as windshield ruptures on impact with another vehicle.
Cut outside as a SPEEDING FIRE TRUCK runs a red light and easily KNOCKS ASIDE the minivan that dared cross its path
Behind the wheel, a rock-hard FEMALE FIREFIGHTER shakes h head at the smaller vehicle that stupidly ignored her bla sirens.
Fuckin’ women drivers...

Outside, the street is LITTERED with crashed cars, most o which contain the CORPSES of recently deceased male drive A few small FIRES dot the landscape. This looks more like Fallujah than Jersey. The fire truck reluctantly slows to a halt as it confront JERSEY CITY POLICE CAR parked in the middle of the road. Outside the squaddie, a Hispanic FEMALE POLICE OFFICER i cradling the lifeless body of her MALE PARTNER, whose fac smeared with fresh blood. The female firefighter hops out of her vehicle to assist sister-in-arms.
Marianella!
They’re dead, Nat. The whole precinct.
I know, I’m the only one left from Ladder Ten. It’s... it’s gotta be Al Qaeda. Smallpox or something.

Then why are we okay? Why aren’t we-— The female officer is interrupted by the sudden arrival o AMBULANCE, which screeches to a halt inches from the two other emergency vehicles. A FEMALE EMT hops out and sprin over to the other uniformed women.
What the hell is happening? Dispatch says I’m the only bus responding to calls.
Is your dispatcher a woman? Suddenly, a WAILING SOUND is heard, like a distant wounde animal.
What difference does that make? The sound grows louder.
Is your dispatcher a fucking woman? !
Yuh--yes. Yes. Why? The women raise their voices to compete with the alien so which is even louder now.

It’s the men! All of the men are-- Pull out, as the sound reveals itself to be a BOEING 747. It’s falling out of the goddamn sky. A split-second before the plummeting aircraft crashes int this unlucky trio, we SMASH CUT to:

head_text.subj: BROOKLYN, NEW YORK. FIVE HOURS AGO.

text: Did you know Elvis had a twin brother?

Inside a tastefully decorated office, we learn that the v behind this non sequitur belongs to YORICK BROWN, an oddl attractive 20-something white guy who looks all wrong in tie. He’s wearing one anyway. Yorick’s staring right at u as he nervously rambles:

It’s true. Jesse Garon Presley. He was an identical twin, stillborn a few minutes before Gladys gave birth to the King. They buried him in a shoebox. How insane is that? I mean, what if Jesse had lived and Elvis had died? Or vice versa? It’s destiny, right? Why does fate choose one man over another and all that? Cut across the desk to the unimpressed FEMALE EXECUTIVE w apparently been interviewing Yorick.
And that’s why we should hire you to be an assistant editor?
I'm just saying, I’m more Elvis than Jesse. Plus, I’m a ninja with the grammar. Ma’am. The woman looks over Yorick’s resume.
You haven't worked since you graduated more than two years ago?
No, I’ve, uh, sorta been doing the Kerouac thing. Minus the road trip. Or traveling. Or leaving my apartment at all, really. I’ve been thinking. Mostly thinking.
Mr. Brown...
Yorick. Please. Mr. Brown is my father. My grandfather, actually. Professor Brown is my old man. He--
Yorick, I'll be honest. With your lack of publishing experience, I never even would have given you an interview if Congresswoman Brown hadn’t asked me personally.
My... my mom called you?
I’m sorry, son. You're a good kid, but you’re still a kid. Push in on Yorick, not quite ready to give up.
Did you know Nixon once deputized Elvis to be a secret agent?

The President is a bitch. INT. DOLL FACTORY —- MORNING It’s after hours inside a dimly lit DOLL FACTORY that’s cluttered with unassembled plastic body parts of girls’ t Standing under a naked bulb in this warehouse-sized room AGENT 355, a late-twenties African-American woman who cou kill you with a single dreadlock.
If you want him dead, I’m your man. Pull out, as we reveal that Agent 355 is speaking with tw men, a seated RUSSIAN BUSINESSMAN and the nervous ASSISTA standing behind him.
And yet... you’re not. I am paying for an assassin, not a--
The woman comes very highly recommended, sir. She took down the head of Roberto Oil. In Venezuela? 355 smiles.

Haven’t you heard? We’re the deadlier of the species. If Mother Russia could hold onto her brides better, maybe you wouldn’t have to outsource all your dirty work. The frowning Russian businessman just stares at 355... bu his grimace eventually gives way to a smile.
You remind me of my first wife.
Messy divorce?
I cut her face off and had it stretched into a lampshade.

(ignoring this) Give me the first ten million now, and POTUS will be dead before he leaves his stupid ranch. The businessman motions to his assistant, who brings 355 SUITCASE. Just as he’s about to hand over this case, 355 GRABS the assistant’s wrist and TWISTS it behind his back With her free hand, 355 pulls out a GLOCK, which she pres to her startled hostage’s head.
Federal agent! You’re both under arrest!
Which federal agency?

You're not really in a position to be asking questions, fuckface. The businessman calmly raises a finger, and GUNSHOTS ring as the hostage’s chest suddenly EXPLODES. The dead assist slumps to the ground, as SEVERAL HEAVILY ARMED RUSSIAN BRUISERS step out of the shadows behind their boss.

Hurt her as much as you want, but I get to finish it. 355’s eyes narrow, as she uses her free hand to pull out BALLISTIC BATON, which she EXTENDS with a satisfying THIN The first of the six thugs RUNS at 355, and she promptly SHOOTS him in the chest, knocking him to the ground. The next uses his muscular forearm to CHOP the Glock out 355’s hand, but she SWINGS her metal baton right into one his eye sockets. As this blinded man screams in pain, two more charge at 3 She GRABS the first by his thick neck and SNAPS it by usi his skull as a fulcrum to SWING around and KICK his partn in the face with devastating force. 355 continues to throw punches and break bones, until she eventually overpowered by Russian muscle. As the men wres her to the ground, 355 looks up to see the businessman holding one of his goons’ machine guns.
I’m going to enjoy reading by the light of your face. And with that, he SMASHES her in the skull with the butt the weapon, knocking her unconscious.
A dejected Yorick shambles towards his rundown brownstone Queens, as an AIRPLANE roars directly overhead. He lives right next door to LaGuardia Airport. What a nightmare.
As Yorick forces open the sticky front door, he’s greeted his very PREGNANT NEIGHBOR, who’s retrieving her mail.
How'd it go, Yorick?
Better than the last three?
Well, you’ll get it next time. Yorick looks at her belly.
You know yet or you want it to be a surprise?
Oh, we just found out. Little boy.

Seriously? Congrats, that’s so-- The two are immediately interrupted by their TRANSVESTITE LANDLORD, a man trying (unconvincingly) to pass as a woma S/he angrily slings open the door to his/her ground floor apartment.
Something in your apartment smells like shit.
Oh. Yeah. Sorry. I... I think I burnt popcorn last--
It’s literally shit, Yorick. The lease says no animals! Yorick quickly gathers his bills and trudges up the stair
(under his breath) No, it says no cats or dogs... Yorick pushes into his dark pad, a hilariously tiny studi apartment decorated with posters of HOUDINI and other assorted nerdery.
Ampersand? Amp? Where are you, buddy? Your questionable hygiene has run its course, little man. Time for-- Suddenly, a DARK FIGURE steps out of the shadows, startli Yorick, who screams like a girl.

Who the hell are you? EXT. STREETS OF RAMALLAH —- EVENING This question belongs to COLONEL ALTER TSE’ELON, a thirty something soldier of the Israeli Defense Forces. She's holding a large MACHINE GUN and smoking casually, as are SOLDIERS, several of whom also happen to be female. Pull out to reveal that Alter is addressing an AMERICAN TELEVISION REPORTER and his CAMERAMAN.
We're Americans.
I never would have guessed. ALTER is joined by her second-in-command, an attractive y Israeli female soldier named RACHEL.
They're doing a piece on female combat soldiers, Alter.
They're not doing anything until our patrol is finished. Suddenly, GUNSHOTS ring out. The reporter and his cameram flinch, but the Israeli soldiers just casually toss their cigarettes aside.
Are... are they shooting at us, um, Alter?

My name is Colonel Tse’elon, and you will address me as such. Come, my team and I will get you to safety. The reporter subtly signals for his cameraman to keep filming, as Alter escorts the crew double-time through th dark streets.
So, how did you--
Twenty-one months of military service is compulsory for all Israeli women.
Yeah, but this is sort of a new phenomenon, right? Women on the front lines?

My grandmother crossed into enemy territory during our War of Independence, and her grandmother was part of the all-female Battalion of Death during the Russian Revolution. Alter stops, and turns to speak directly into the videographer’s camera.

Defending our territory at any cost is in women’s blood, as the new crop of girls strapping on bomb belts for Islamic Jihad will be happy to-- Without warning, a nearby car EXPLODES in a deafening bur of sound and fury, KNOCKING everyone to the ground. INT. YORICK’S APARTMENT —- MORNING Matching this flash, a frightened Yorick flips on his LIG SWITCH, illuminating an unexpected vision standing before him: a 20-something blonde bombshell named BETH DEVILLE, too beautiful for a geek like Yorick... or is she? Beth’s wearing a TRENCHCOAT that’s closed tight over her thin bo  10
Beth?
Hey, handsome.
I thought you weren’t coming over for another-- She kisses him.
You talk too much. Yorick smiles, as he looks down at her coat.
What’s with the trench? You’re flying to sunny Los Angeles, not old-timey London.
I’m insulted. This is what I wore to our first date, remember? Midnight screening of Miller's Crossing at the Angelika? You said I looked like a degenerate flasher.
That wasn’t our date! You were still seeing my troglodyte of a roommate.
So, you were seeing Libby!
You guys set me up with her! And she covered her eyes every time someone in the movie got shot.
Well, my date kept falling asleep.

(pulling Beth close) But right after the Danny Boy scene, when Leo blew that guy’s brains out and stole his tommy gun, you turned to me and whispered, “That was the coolest motherfucking thing I’ve ever seen.”  He kisses her.
And that’s when I knew you were the only degenerate flasher I would ever love.
And that’s when I knew I needed a better wardrobe. Beth undoes her trenchcoat, revealing skimpy LINGERIE underneath. Yorick is predictably awestruck.
Wow. I mean, that is--
Shh. It’s a going-away present.
But, I’m not the one leaving town... unless those pharmaceutical nerds want you so bad, they've thrown in an extra ticket. Beth sighs. They’ve obviously had this conversation befor
My internship’s only for three months, Yorick.
Sure, until you discover the cure for cancer, and they offer you-- Fed up, Beth PUSHES Yorick to the floor and climbs on top him.
Do you have protection? Yorick fumbles for a nearby box. He tips it over and out spills DUCT TAPE, a GASMASK, and various CANNED GOODS.
Do you have anthrax? Beth kisses him.
It’s fine.  12 She starts grinding against him.
Are... are you sure that’s safe?
Yeah, I’m on the shot. Yorick kisses her back, but stops abruptly.
Wait, what shot? Beth smiles.
The one I invented. Close on Yorick’s panicked expression.
What the hell are you talking about?

Standing outside of a large convention center ballroom is VICTORIA, a conservatively dressed redhead in her late thirties. She’s arguing with a REGISTRATION OFFICIAL, whi dozens of MALE GRANDMASTERS play chess behind him.
I registered months ago!
I'm sorry, Mrs.--
It's Ms. If they didn’t put it under my last name, try Victoria.
Ma’am, it doesn’t matter what your name is, I can’t let you compete. The women’s tournament isn’t until next week.  13
“Women's?” We're playing chess. This is a competition of the mind!
You'll have to take that up with the organizers, ma’am.
You call me “ma’am” one more time, I‘ll rip out your hair plugs.
Security! Two MEN IN BLUE BLAZERS rush over to remove Victoria.

I’m a grandmaster! I could beat any man in that room! The security officers GRAB Victoria, but she shakes them and steps away from the registration table. On her way ou of the center, she looks back and threatens:
There’s a reason the queen is the most powerful piece, you know! INT. YORICK’S APARTMENT - DAY Back in his pad, a post-coital Yorick is in bed now, lyin next to a disrobed Beth.
Was that okay? Beth smiles as she runs her fingers over his chest.
Which part of “faster, harder, again” confused you?
No, I mean, about me finishing, um, inside you. Beth rolls over, a little hurt.
Yorick, this is what got me my stupid scholarship. (MORE )
14 BETH (cont'd) The hormones I synthesized are just as effective as the pill.
Then why not just take that?
Because if it weren’t for researches being brave enough to test shit on themselves, we'd still have malaria and anemia and a million other diseases.
You don’t have a disease, Beth. (a nervous beat) Do you? Beth stands, covering herself in a blanket.
Baby, you have no idea what it’s like to bleed for days on end. But the science exists for women to permanently suppress ovulation, to get rid of the monthly visitor forever.
I thought you were the one girl who didn’t mind the sight of blood.
(a little melancholy) Yeah, well... people change, I guess.
As long as you’re sure it, you know, works. Beth smiles again, as she rubs her flat stomach.
I promise, the last thing I want is any little surprises in my-- Suddenly, a SMALL CREATURE leaps out of the shadows and l on Beth’s shoulder. Understandably, she SCREAMS.

head_text.subj: SAN FRANCISCO, CALIFORNIA. ONE HOUR AGO.

text: 15 A SCREECHING ANIMAL is heard under this title card.

Inside a hi-tech facility, a RAT hisses in pain as it’s injected with a long syringe. Pull out to reveal that we’re in a laboratory FILLED with CAGED LAB ANIMALS (mice, baboons, etc.). The scientist behind this experiment is DR. ALLISON MANN, a stoic Chine American woman in her early thirties.
Easy, girl. It only hurts the first time.

Yeah, I’ve used that line a few times myself. Mann turns to see her VISITOR, an intimidating man wearin the kind of standard-issue black suit that suggests you’r about to be killed or audited or both.
Then here’s a new one for you. “No means no.” I’ve told you a hundred times, I’m not interested in helping you.
Dr. Mann, China is dangerously close to becoming a peer competitor to the United States, and unless we can slow the growth of its strategic arsenal--
Why are you people coming to me? I'm Chinese!
No, you're Chinese-American, and if you had any love for your heritage or the family you left behind, Dr. Ming, you wouldn’t have taken your new name from a faux-Oriental movie theater in L.A.
(coldly) I was eighteen when I did that.  16
Doctor, your country needs you.
I’m interested in creating life, not destroying it.
Yeah, but your work isn’t cheap, is it? It'd be a shame if your funding suddenly expired. Mann stops what she’s doing.
Are you threatening me?
Look, Allison, we’re not interested in hurting anyone. We’re just looking for ways to alter the geopolitical landscape if and when push comes to shove with the People’s Republic.
Whatever, along with being junk science, your plan is a grotesque violation of the natural order.
And animal cloning isn't?

Every twin on the planet is a “clone.” There’s a precedent. What you’re suggesting is impossible. The Visitor tosses a classified file folder onto Mann’s d It’s labelled “SETTING SON: PRIMATE RESEARCH PROPOSAL”
We'll see.
What is this?

The first step. Call me if you want to be there for the second.  17 Before exiting the lab, the Visitor taps on one of the sleeping baboon’s glass prisons, causing the frothing ani to SPRING to life. INT. YORICK’S APARTMENT - DAY A mortified Yorick screams at his off-screen pet.
Ampersand, no! Cut over to Beth, who is trying to pry AMPERSAND, a male capuchin HELPER MONKEY, off of her shoulder.
What the hell is it?
(drawing a “&” in the air with his finger) You know, that curly symbol for “and,” like in Turner & Hooch or--
I know what an ampersand is, asshat. What is... ow! As the diaper-clad monkey BITES Beth’s finger, Yorick rea out to take the animal.
I’m so sorry. He’s supposed to be a helper monkey.
Please don’t tell me you’ve gotten that lazy.

It’s not for me. I volunteered to train this feces-slinging bastard to help quadriplegics with their daily chores and shit. I wanted to have him ready before you left, but he got stuck in customs after some kind of paperwork screw-up, so--
Yorick, you couldn’t keep sea monkeys alive. Why would you do that?  18 Beth walks into the tiny bathroom to wash her wound, clos the door behind her and leaving Yorick alone with his pet

I don’t know. I guess I just wanted to use my abundant free time to help people. I mean, you and the rest of my globetrotting pals are off saving the world or whatever, and I haven’t done a goddamn thing for anyone.
Yorick, look. Before I go, there's... there’s something I need to tell you. Yorick pulls a tiny BOX out of a nearby drawer, and looks down at the little cube thoughtfully.

Wait, me first. I’ve been meaning to say this for a long time. He opens the box, revealing a modest ENGAGEMENT RING. As speaks, Beth runs the water in the bathroom, just barely drowning out his quiet voice.

Beth, you're brilliant and sexy and you know the names of all six and half of the Three Stooges. I didn’t even know they made women like you. I want to spend-- Yorick nervously SHUTS the little ring box as Beth steps of the bathroom, now wearing conservative attire.
I should really go, baby. Before Yorick can protest, she kisses him deeply.
I’1l call you every day, okay?
Wait, um, can I at least carry your bags? Beth reaches out to pet Ampersand with her newly bandaged finger.  19

You should probably stay here and take care of Chim Chim, huh? Besides, it’s not like I have very far to walk. On cue, the windows in Yorick’s apartment begin to RATTLE a passenger jet THUNDERS directly overhead. A dejected Yorick watches Beth leave, as Ampersand picks something out of his hair.
Agent 355 is now seated in a folding chair, with her hand HANDCUFFED behind her. The bruises on her face suggest th she’s been tortured for the last few hours by the Russian mobster and his henchmen.
I‘1l ask you one more time, what is your name?
I told you, I’m Agent 355.
Fuck the rank and serial number bullshit! Tell me your name!
My colleagues will be here any second now.

It’s been hours. If anyone knew where you were, they would have been here already. Now tell me who you work for. 355 says nothing, as the businessman begins playing with collapsible baton he took from her. He’s suggestively extending and retracting the hard metal rod.

If you can’t put words in your mouth... perhaps we will find something else to put in there. As the businessman nods, one of his henchmen UNZIPS his p and approaches 355, who bravely grits her teeth.  20

In the aftermath of the explosion, several Israeli ARMORE VEHICLES have arrived to provide backup (and escort the shaken American reporter and his cameraman to safety). A bandaged Alter is smoking on top of a parked TANK, as Rac her second-in-command arrives with a situation report.
How many?
Six injured, two dead. Noa and Sagee. Alter takes a long drag off her cigarette.
Thank you, Rachel. Just then, male voices (speaking Hebrew) are heard scream over Rachel’s radio. Gradually, the screaming becomes LIVE, as the male soldie surrounding them begin to scream as well.
The hell...?
Victoria is sitting on a park bench, watching as overweig men in business suits walk past. She's rolling a PAWN PIECE back and forth across her knuckles.
As a baby CRIES somewhere in the plane’s cabin, a pensive Beth is looking out her window at the world far below. Sh the only person in her aisle.
Excuse me. Beth turns to see a handsome thirty-something AFRICAN- AMERICAN MAN.  21
Really sorry to bother you, but that kid is driving me insane. Mind if I sit here? Beth looks up at him. A brief beat.
Not at all.
Dr. Mann paces as she talks on her cell phone.

Listen to me, you have to stop this now. I/’11 give you whatever you want, but if you go through with this without my guidance... The doctor looks up as she hears one of her animals whimp in pain. She returns to her phone, but the line’s dead.
Hello? dHello...? INT. YORICK’S APARTMENT - DAY A dejected Yorick feeds small pieces of fruit to his monk who promptly FLINGS them across the room.
Just you and me now.
Now

Earth hangs silently in the void. At the speed of light, ZOOM IN on the planet, until we co to rest on an ABORIGINAL MAN in the Australian Outback. He coughs into his hand, and looks down to see a few drop BLOOD.  22

As one of the menacing Russian henchmen approaches the handcuffed Agent 355, she KICKS him in the knee, painfull HYPEREXTENDING the joint. He collapses, and 355 uses the momentum to FALL backwards and SLIDE free of her chair. W her hands still cuffed behind her, she WHEEL KICKS to her feet... only to find the Russian businessman with his gun pressed to her temple. 355 closes her eyes and prepares for the worst, when this suddenly begins coughing violently. She watches in disbel as he begins to VOMIT blood. The businessman drops his gun and 355’s baton to grab at own throat, as he suddenly begins to bleed out of his eye nose and ears. His henchmen soon follow suit. 355 can only watch in stunned confusion as the Russian terrorists die painful deaths, leaving her all alone in t quiet factory.
A lone SECRETARY screams in terror as hundreds of JAPANES BUSINESSMEN begin to bleed out of every orifice in a tsun of crimson.
As male soldiers begin to drop left and right, Rachel pul out a HYPODERMIC and screams in Hebrew at her fellow troo
It’s an attack! Use your atropine! But before she can inject herself, Alter GRABS the young soldier's wrist.
No. This can’t be gas. It’s... it’s just the men.

A group of NUNS scream at each other in Italian as they c the lifeless bodies of several CATHOLIC PRIESTS.  23 EXT. CLEVELAND PARK — DAY As the male contingent of the morning rush collapses to t sidewalk, push in on Victoria, who sets down her chess piece... and SMILES.
Scantily clad PROSTITUTES press against the glass of thei storefront windows to look out at the JOHNS bleeding out across the streets of the Netherlands.
As her male lab animals writhe in pain, an enraged Dr. Ma picks up a heavy glass beaker and THROWS it against the w
A FEMALE GIRAFFE stands watch over the body of her lifele MATE, as a train spectacularly DERAILS in the background.

As FRIGHTENED FEMALE PASSENGERS cry and scream, Beth push her way past her now deceased aisle-mate to accost a catatonic FLIGHT ATTENDANT. The suddenly pilotless plane ROCKS to one side, knocking Beth into the woman.
We have to get inside that cockpit!
What’s the point? This is the Rapture. God didn’t choose us.
What are you talking about? This is some kind of... of germ warfare! Why would God only take the men?
Because we’re the daughters of Eve. We created sin when we tempted Adam in the-- A furious Beth PULLS the flight attendant close to her by front of her uniform and whispers an inch from her face.  24

Listen to me, you dumb bitch. You will pull yourself together and help us land this plane or me and every woman in this cabin will kick the living shit out of you in hell. The flight attendant stares at her blankly.
A frantic FEMALE NASA SCIENTIST rushes past her recently deceased MISSION CONTROL COLLEAGUES to attend to hundreds flashing lights.

(through heavy static) Houston, Houston... do you read...? INT. YORICK’S APARTMENT - DAY Yorick is startled by the sound of a distant CRASH, follo by muffled screams outside his door. Carrying Ampersand on his shoulder, he nervously steps ou into his hallway, only to see his transvestite landlord collapsed on the floor. His/her long wig is lying ina puddle of blood.

Briana...? Yorick looks up when he hears faint whimpering on the stairwell. He races over to find the pregnant neighbor wo he spoke with earlier. There’s blood running down her leg and she’s CRADLING something we can’t quite see in her ar

I... I lost him, Yorick. Hearing cries of help coming from the street, Yorick reluctantly leaves this woman to step outside. There, he’ greeted by A DEAD MAILMAN, A DEAD DELIVERY BOY, A DEAD HOMELESS MAN, and much, much more male carnage. Women run in fear and confusion, as a plane SMASHES into AIR TRAFFIC CONTROL TOWER in the background. Horrified beyond words, Yorick can only cover his mouth, while the animal on his shoulder SCREAMS.  25

This suburban street is crowded with crashed cars. A larg sign reads: “LADIES: DUSK-TO-DAWN CURFEW STRICTLY ENFORCE Pull out to reveal a LONE FIGURE. This person is holding of those small ANIMAL CARRIERS for little dogs, and weari HOODED PONCHO and GASMASK not unlike the one we saw in a certain emergency preparedness kit earlier. It’s Yorick. Suddenly, a blaring HORN is heard, as the disguised Yoric DIVES out of the way to avoid being hit by an out-of-cont GARBAGE TRUCK, which careens into a nearby tree.

A dazed woman steps out of the truck’s smoking cab. By al accounts, she’s a SUPERMODEL, a stunningly gorgeous 19-ye old woman wearing the odd combination of fashionably tigh attire and heavy-duty work gloves.
Oh my god. Lady, are you okay?
(muffled by gasmask) I... I’m fine.
You sure? What’s wrong with your voice?
Just... got the wind knocked out of me.

I am so sorry. I just started driving this thing, and I still suck at braking. Doesn’t exactly handle like my old Miata, you know? I should probably...  26 The Supermodel walks around to the back of her garbage tr and reacts with disappointment.
Aw, shit.
What?
They fell out. Cut to the back of the truck, where several BADLY DECOMPO MALE CORPSES have fallen out of the vehicle.
Oh, Christ. They’re... they’re all...
Yep, all mine. But if you gimme a quick hand with these dudes, I might consider sharing the profits.
This... this is your job?
I know, right? It’s been more than a month, and there are still a ton of single dudes rotting in their apartments. She starts dragging one of the lighter corpses.

Everyone’s worried about diseases and shit, so the CDC pays me a can of food for every corpse I bring in. Only work I could find. Fucked up, huh? Yorick picks up his ANIMAL CARRIER and looks inside to ma sure its occupant is still safe. A little MONKEY’S PAW reaches out before Yorick pushes it back in.

I used to have a modeling contract with Wilhelmina, and now I’ma goddamn garbage girl. Worst part is, I spent three grand on my boobs two days before the Plague hit. Fat lot of good our tits do us now.  27
What do you do with these bodies?
I take ‘em over to RFK. No one’s using the stadium anymore, so they turned it into one of those... whatchamacallits. Crematoriums. Yorick tries not to puke.

You all right? Take a few deep breaths. You don’t have to wear that mask anymore, you know. If whatever wiped them out could've hurt us, we'd be dead already. The masked figure turns and walks away from the confused model, leaving her alone with her work.
Yeah, well, better safe than sorry.
Later that evening, the masked figure arrives at an expen home, completely unlit thanks to the lack of electricity.
Yorick pushes his way inside the dark foyer. He finally takes off his mask, revealing a few days worth of stubble
Hello? Is anybody-- Without warning, a figure steps out of the shadows and CL Yorick in the head with a heavy MAG FLASHLIGHT.
Ow! Son of a bitch! Yorick rubs his head as he turns to see the woman we’1ll learn is his MOTHER, Congresswoman Jennifer Brown.
Literally, I guess. The woman turns on the flashlight to get a better look at young man she just struck.  28
Yorick? Is... is that you?
Hi, mom. The congresswoman DROPS her flashlight and EMBRACES her s
I prayed every second, Yorick. I prayed every second for you, but I never thought--
I’m sorry. It took me weeks just to get out of New York. Yorick’'s mother begins to WEEP tears of joy. She hugs hi again, stroking his hair so hard she’s almost pulling it
Tell me this is real. Please. I can’t live through another goddamn dream like this, Yorick. I can’t--
It’s real. I checked on all my friends. David and Jeff and Dan and Jay and--
And are you...?
The only one? I think so. Unless dad... I mean, is daddy still...? Congresswoman Brown wipes away her tears, and gives her s look that clearly says “No.”
Damn. Goddamn it. GODDAMN IT! Yorick PUNCHES a wall as hard as he can. He collapses to the floor, taking a seat next to his pet carrier. Yorick dries his eyes with the back of a sleeve.
